title: I have a problem with connecting to the game, im need help please.
body: I opened the main page and i click launch and the second page of the login does not appear to me. Im use the old client.I tried to repair and its not working.

replies.body: If I understand correctly, you're selecting the Launch button but the client is not appearing.  You could have a security issue that's preventing it from opening.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
